name: Miasma
description:
Miasma is a first-person psychological horror maze game with a horrific atmosphere, it takes place in a maze with a mysterious creature lurking in it, and your only hope of survival is to find a way to escape.

SURVIVE



Investigate and survive this maze. But be careful, you are not alone.

Tools



Use the motion tracker to locate the enemy but be careful. It can hear you

HIDE OR FLIGHT



You will experience terror.

INVESTIGATE



Roam through the maze looking for clues on how to find a way out.

DISCORD CHANNEL
